resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app settings, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_title
string-array.item: "Continuation of Exposure Logging after Sharing Your Random IDs"

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "If you have an increased risk, you can start and take a survey conducted by the Robert Koch Institute from within the app."
"You now have the option of sharing your usage data, which will help us to improve the app."
"Minor changes to the texts on the risk tiles."
"After you have shared your encrypted random IDs, you can decide whether and when you want to switch exposure logging back on."
"There is now a separate tab page for your contact journal. This lets you access your journal and switch from the contact journal back to the home screen of the app more quickly."
"The app now contains more detailed information about the testing procedure."
